title: MEDIA ADVISORY: President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




June 29, 2009

 



MEDIA ADVISORY: President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  __________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                        June 29, 2009    President Obama to Hold Health Care Town Hall on Wednesday  WASHINGTON, D.C. - This Wednesday, July 1, President Barack Obama will hold a national discussion on health care through an online town hall meeting in Annandale, Virginia. In addition to the live audience, questions will come from online communities such as Facebook, YouTube and Twitter. For more information go to: /blog/A-National-Discussion-on-Health-Care-Reform/ WEDNESDAY, JULY 1, 2009  HEALTH CARE TOWN HALL WITH PRESIDENT BARACK OBAMA  NVCC Annandale Campus   8333 Little River Turnpike   Annandale, VA Press Pre-Set Time: 9:00 a.m. – 9:30 a.m. (Media will not have access to equipment between 10:00 a.m. and 11:15 a.m.). Press Access Time: 11:15 a.m.  Doors Open: 11:45 a.m.   Program begins: 1:15   Satellite Truck Parking: Dedicated lane in front of Ernst Cultural Center   Cable Run: 400   Throw: 35 feet Contact for logistical purposes: Kenny Thompson, 202-503-5640   Media wishing to cover this event must RSVP at: /the_press_office/MediaRSVP-HealthCareTownHall/
